I used to study biology, software engineering and mathematics and continue to interact with all these fields in various ways.

My current interests include:

  • Algebraic topology and applications
  • Homological algebra and category theory
  • Domain specific languages
  • Mathematical software
  • Distributed systems
  • Algebra and applications in general

Please visit links page of this website to see in more detail what I am doing.

And I welcome you in my blog. I appreciate any focused discussion and will happily accept any correction I agree with. I write these texts mostly in order to reflect on professional experience, polish understanding of some things or share some mathematical path.
